oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Soldier's Story of The Siege of Vicksburg
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This book belonged to Cpl. George H. Wiseheart, Co. E, 11th Ill. Inf. Regt., USA. The book includes "A Soldier's Story of the "Siege of Vicksburg" from the Diary of Osborn H. Oldroyd with Confederate Accounts from Authentic Sources and an introduction by Brevet Maj. Gen. M. F. Force". Born in 1842 in Hardin Co., KY, Cpl. Wiseheart was the grandfather of the donor and died in 1939. Sgt. Osborn Oldroyd served in Co. E, 20th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA.
